channel.title: [BUG] Apprehension - Pumps/Crushers
channel.description:
At the point where you are jumping across three of the large crushers, if you throw a barrel onto one it ends up freezing as the compactors never reach each other.
Its neither game breaking nor should have occurred (I threw it up there), just interesting.

item.description:
At the point where you are jumping across three of the large crushers, if you throw a barrel onto one it ends up freezing as the compactors never reach each other.
